dialogue.speaker: freya
text: im just glad that over with

dialogue.speaker: freya
text: that hater so annoying...

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: yep just glad we took em down.

dialogue.speaker: kanimate
text: You said it.

dialogue.speaker: kanimate
text: Hold on, I gotta go clean my knife, I'll be right back.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: Okay, see ya, bye!

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: Hmm, I'm hungry.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: *hears BF Kit whistling*

dialogue.speaker: freya
text: ahh it looks like some fresh meat has step up our way

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Huh?

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Hey wait a sec...

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: You're Freya_FennecFoxes right?

dialogue.speaker: freya
text: Why yes I a-

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Mika better.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: oh here we go again, now with a twist???

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Have any of you guys seen that blocky furry?

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: its killer animate, dont ya know the difference

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: Tomato, Tomato same thing.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: dude, he's flatter than a cube, at least learn some geometry, blue-dyed kitten

dialogue.speaker: kanimate
text: Hey guys, I'm back after cleaning my knife-

dialogue.speaker: kanimate
text: *drops knife*

dialogue.speaker: kanimate
text: Who the hell is that.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: another mika fan. apparently, he has a shirt unlike the rest, i dont know why...

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Oh look its the blocky furry.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: ITS CALLED KILLER ANIMATE, ARE YOU MENTALLY INSANE?????

dialogue.speaker: kanimate
text: I have a shotgun and im not afraid to use it.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: nah, i own a glock, every mika fan that finds me gets shot with this thing.

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Yeah right.

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: Anyways, I challange you to a rap battle!

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: every mod with bf, does this, ofc.

dialogue.speaker: bfkit
text: If you win, I'll let you kill me. But if I win, I'll kill you.

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: you really want to take that offer?

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: if so...

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: if so...

dialogue.speaker: milky
text: then i guess i have dinner tonight.

dialogue.speaker: freya
text: anything's better thna dealing with that idiot

dialogue.speaker: freya
text: youre on!
